spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout deviations from the 2D plan. (E2/E4) The entry location appears shifted (plan: bottom-center entry into hall; render: entry/opening reads closer to bottom-left edge). (E2) Bedroom placements do not match: the plan shows Bedroom 1 at top-right and Bedroom 2 mid-right; the render shows one clear bedroom at the far right and another bed/room-like space near the bottom-center that does not correspond to Bedroom 2’s planned position. (E2) Bathroom position/shape appears altered (plan: bottom center-right with tub; render: bathroom zone reads more bottom-center with different internal partitioning; tub not clearly represented). (E3) Multiple interior door positions and swing orientations differ from the plan (hall-to-bedroom/bath/laundry). (E2) Window count/locations do not align: plan has specific perimeter window placements per room; render uses larger/continuous windows along top/right that do not match the plan. (E4) Room proportions are not preserved (hall and living/bedroom areas appear rebalanced relative to stated plan sizes).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is mostly consistent and clean in the render, but plan fidelity is weak. (E2) Adjacency relationships are partially broken: Bedroom 2 should be adjacent to the hall on the right side; in the render the secondary sleeping area is not in the correct adjacency/location. (E1) Closets are missing or not represented correctly (plan includes a closet near laundry and a closet near bathroom/hall; render does not clearly show these as separate enclosed closets with doors). (E5) Extra/ambiguous sleeping area (a bed placed near bottom-center) suggests a hallucinated room/function or a misassigned Bedroom 2. (E2/E3) Door embedding/locations are inconsistent with the plan (notably at entry and bedroom/bathroom connections).

furniture_mapping.notes: Main public-area furniture is plausible but not mapped tightly to the 2D layout. (E2) Dining table and living seating exist but their relative zoning does not match the plan’s open kitchen/dining-left and living-center arrangement. (E2) Bedroom furniture distribution does not match Bedroom 1 vs Bedroom 2 locations. (E4) Some furniture-to-room scale feels off due to altered room proportions (living and hall feel compressed/expanded relative to plan).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric presentation is clean and readable with consistent materials. Camera is broadly correct for an isometric-style view, though not strictly orthographic. Lighting is adequate and geometry is mostly artifact-free with clear separation of rooms and furnishings.

detected_errors.description: Entry location and hall access do not match the plan (plan: bottom-center entry into hall; render reads closer to bottom-left edge).
Bedroom layout mismatch: Bedroom 2 is not positioned mid-right as in the plan; the render shows a secondary sleeping area nearer bottom-center.
Possible hallucinated/extra sleeping area (bed placed in a location not corresponding to either planned bedroom).
Bathroom location/shape differs from the plan; the planned tub layout is not clearly represented.
Closets shown in the plan (near laundry and near bathroom/hall) are missing or not clearly modeled as enclosed closets with doors.
Multiple interior door placements and swing orientations (hall-to-bedroom/bath/laundry) do not match the 2D plan.
Window placement/count mismatch: render uses larger/continuous window runs that do not align with the plan’s discrete window positions per room.
Room proportions are distorted relative to the 2D plan (hall and living/bedroom sizes appear rebalanced).
